channel.title: Personal on Four Sore Eyes
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Four Sore Eyes

item.title: Condecision
item.description: The following is a running list of words inspired by The Dictionary of Obscure Sorrows by John Koenig Condecision: A state where decision making is impeded for an awareness that whatever decision is made the consequences are likely to have a net negative outcome. Emplosion: An occurance when ones empathic sensibilities contribute to a state condecision to the point of emotional, cognitive and behavioral collapse. Nuclear Emplosion A special case of emplosion when ones empathic sensibilities are spread across 2 or more others whose needs are in conflict each other.

item.title: Write out in the open
item.description: Reasoning ‘A Site Four Sore Eyes’ This is place where I can publish my ideas for the audience of me. I have an ever growing number of thixotropic reasons for setting up this platform. Probably the greatest overarching argument is to give me a place where I can air out my most persistent ruminations. This, in my fuzzy uncheckable logic, might - just might - provide some time and virtual space between my, in-this-moment thoughts, and my many-later-moments reconsiderations, allowing me to take them in with fresher, or simply differently focused eyes.
